best.why: It matches the manifesto’s controlled severity: crisp parallel definitions, concrete examples, and a clean moral distinction (judgment vs frictionless output) without drifting into topical name-dropping or extra theatrics.

worst.why: The brand-naming and baroque invective (“vomit,” “algorithm-serf”) shifts the voice from austere diagnosis into rant, breaking the manifesto’s measured rhythm and timelessness.

must_survive_line: We oppose smoothness the way a riverbed opposes water: not to stop it, but to give it shape.
